S

setBoardState(int, boolean) - Method in class core.GameBoard
Adds new pieces to the board based on the selection of the Player.
setCompBoardState() - Method in class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
Looks for the first open spot on the board and fills it with 'O'.
setDrawState() - Method in class core.GameBoard
Changes the draw state to true if there are no pieces left to be placed.
setPlayerXTurn(boolean) - Method in class core.Connect4Logic
Takes a boolean argument set by the GameBoard that flips the boolean value for if it's Player X's turn to switch who is next to make a move.
setWinState(char) - Method in class core.GameBoard
The method checks for a win state horizontally, vertically, and diagonally.
start(Stage) - Method in class ui.Connect4GUI
Acts as the main method and sets the Stage for the GUI Scenes to sit on top of.
subtractOnePiece() - Method in class core.GameBoard
Decrements the piece count down by 1 when called.
